mods.abstract: Details of recent developments of the Feynman diagram analyzer DIANA (DIagram ANAlyser) are presented. Apart from some discussion about QGRAF and new plotting features, we concentrate on a new sophisticated mechanism of momenta mapping. (c) 2005 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
